trans-unit.target: Gukora Ipaki ntangarugero ya Bloom y'umusomyi...

trans-unit.source: The {0} Collection is now ready to use on this computer.
trans-unit.target: Ikuzanya {0} riratunganye ku buryo ryakoreshwa kuri iyi mudasobwa.

trans-unit.source: Bloom was not able to install that Bloom Pack
trans-unit.target: Bloom ntiyashoboye kwensitara iyo paki ya Bloom

trans-unit.note: Shown while BloomPacks are being installed

trans-unit.source: Bloom is already running, but the contents will not show up until the next time you run Bloom
trans-unit.target: Bloom yamaze gufunguka, ariko amakuru ayirimo ntagaragara kugeza ikindi gihe uri bwongere kuyifungura

trans-unit.source: Show Experimental Commands (e.g. Export XML for InDesign)
trans-unit.target: Kwerekana Komande z'igerageza (urg. Kwimirira XML muri InDesign)

trans-unit.source: Use Image Server to reduce memory usage with large images.
trans-unit.target: Gukoresha seriveri y'ishusho mu kuganbanya ikoreshwa rya memwari n'amashusho manini.
trans-unit.note: This option will probably go away, as any bugs with the Image Server get ironed out. This has to do with how Bloom works internally; the I.S. makes it work better on slow computers.
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Vernacular Language', but in a source collection, Vernacular has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 2 (e.g. National Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
In a vernacular collection, we say 'Language 3 (e.g. Regional Language)', but in a source collection, National Language has no relevance, so we use this different label
If there is no third language specified, the link changes to this.
If you make certain changes in the settings dialog, the OK button changes to this.

trans-unit.source: Bloom will close and re-open this project with the new settings.
trans-unit.target: Bloom igiye kwifunga yongere ifungure uyu mushinga mu yindi mitunganyirize.

trans-unit.source: Make a book using this source

trans-unit.note: This is is the button you use to create a new collection, open a new one, or get one from a repository somewhere

trans-unit.source: Get more source books at BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.target: Habwa ibindi bitabo ntangarugero kuri BloomLibrary.org
trans-unit.note: Shown at the bottom of the list of books. User can click on it and it will attempt to open a browser to show the Bloom Library
get this clicking on BloomLibrary.org link in source collection

trans-unit.source: This collection is locked, so new books cannot be added/removed.
trans-unit.target: Iri kusanyirizo rirafunze, bityo nta bitabo bishya bishobora kongerwamo/gukurwamo

trans-unit.note: Brings up the localization dialog
Used for the Finish button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection
Used for the Next button in wizards, like that used for making a New Collection

trans-unit.source: Your download ({0}) is complete. You can see it in the 'Books from BloomLibrary.org' section of your Collections. If you don't seem to be in the middle of doing something, Bloom will select it for you.
trans-unit.target: Ibyo wakururaga ({0}) byarangiye. Ushobora kubisanga mu gice cyitwa 'Ikusanyabitabo rya Bloom' kiboneka mu makusanyirizo yawe. Niba usa n'udafite ikintu uri gukora, Bloom iribukikugaragarize ubwayo.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book.
trans-unit.target: Habaye ikibazo mu gukurura igitabo cyawe

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the inside of the back cover.
trans-unit.target: Niba ukeneye ahantu ho gushyira amakuru y'inyongera kuri iki gitabo, ushobora gukoresha iyiu paji, ariyo gikobokobo cy'inyuma ku gice cyacyo cy'imbere.

trans-unit.source: If you need somewhere to put more information about the book, you can use this page, which is the outside of the back cover.
trans-unit.target: Niba ukeneye ahantu ho gushyira amakuru y'inyongera kuri iki gitabo, ushobora gukoresha iyi paji, ariyo gikobokobo cy'inyuma ku gice cyacyo cy'inyuma.

trans-unit.source: Open the Html used to make this PDF, in Chrome (must be on path)
trans-unit.target: Gufungura Html yakoreshejwe hakorwa iyi PDF, muri Chrom (igomba kuba iri ku nzira)

trans-unit.source: Sorry, the copyright and license for this book cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Tukwiseguyeho, uburenganzira bw'umwanditsi kimwe n'uburenganzira kuri iki gitabo ntibishobora guhindurwa.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this book is locked down so that images cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: Tukwiseguyeho, iki gitabo kirafunzwe kugira ngo amashusho yacyo adahindurwa.

trans-unit.source: This page will be permanently removed.
The current selected font is '{0}', but it is not installed on this computer. Some other font will be used.
trans-unit.target: Inyuguti yatoranyijwe ubu ni '{0}', ariko rero ntyensitaye kuri iyi mudasobwa. Izindi nyuguti ziri bukoreshwe mu mwanya wayo.

trans-unit.source: Changes the text size for all boxes carrying the style '{0}' and language '{1}'.\nCurrent size is {2}pt.
trans-unit.target: Guhindura ubunini bw'inyuguti zigize umwandiko ku tuzu twose dufite inyuguti '{0}' n'ururimi '{1}'.\nubunini bw'iki gihe ni {2}pt.

trans-unit.note: Put {lang} in your translation, so it can be replaced by the language name.

trans-unit.source: Use this to acknowledge any funding agencies.
trans-unit.target: Koresha aha mu gushimira urwego urwo ari rwo rwose rwaguteye inkunga.

trans-unit.source: International Standard Book Number. Leave blank if you don't have one of these.
trans-unit.target: Inomero mpuzamahanga ndangabuziranenge bw'igitabo. Siga uyu mwanya urimo ubusa niba nta yo ufite.

trans-unit.source: The contributions made by writers, illustrators, editors, etc., in {lang}
trans-unit.target: Ibyatanzwe n'abanditsi, abashushanyi, abanonosoranyandiko, nbd., mu {lang}
Ugushimira inonosora rishingiye ku ihindurandimi, mu {lang}

trans-unit.source: Choose a page size and orientation

trans-unit.note: Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for bilingual mode, 2 languages per page
Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for monolingual mode, one language per page

trans-unit.source: There are no other layout options for this template.
trans-unit.target: Nta yinsi misusire iriho kuri iyi ntangarugero.
trans-unit.note: Show in the layout chooser dropdown of the edit tab, if there was only a single layout choice
Shown in edit tab multilingualism chooser, for trilingual mode, 3 languages per page

trans-unit.target: Reba niba nta nonosora rishya ryasohotse

trans-unit.note: This is the title of a dialog about exporting a Bloom book to the InDesign XML format

trans-unit.target: Urupapuro rutambitse A4 Uruhande ku ruhande
Urupapuro rutambitse A4 Rusatuye amapaji yose

trans-unit.source: I agree to the Bloom Library's Terms of Use
trans-unit.target: Nemeranya n'amabwiriza yagenwe mu ikoreshwa ry'Ikusanyabitabo rya Bloom

trans-unit.source: There is already a collection with that name, at {0}.\nPlease pick a unique name.
trans-unit.target: Ikusanyirizo rifite izina nk'iri risanzweho, warisanga kuri {0}.\nTwagusabaga guhitamo izina rindi.

trans-unit.source: Choose the Main Language For This Collection
What would you like to call this collection?
A collection of books in a local language.

trans-unit.note: The {0} is replaced by the name of the language.

trans-unit.source: Unable to create a new collection using that name.
trans-unit.target: Gukora ikusanyirizo rishya ukoresheje iri zina ntibyashobotse

trans-unit.source: You are almost ready to start making books.

trans-unit.note: This shows in the file-open dialog that you use to open a different bloom collection

trans-unit.source: Browse for another collection on this computer
trans-unit.target: Shakisha irindi kusanyirizo kuri iyi mudasobwa

trans-unit.source: Copy From Chorus Hub on Local Network
trans-unit.target: Koporora ubikuye kuri Chorus Hub ku rusobesangano lokali

trans-unit.note: This opens the Chorus Help to learn more about send/receive.

trans-unit.source: That change is not allowed. Front matter and back matter pages must remain where they are
trans-unit.target: Iri hindura ntiryemewe. Igikobokobo cy'imbere n'igikobokobo cy'inyuma bigomba kuguma aho biri

trans-unit.source: Please install Adobe Reader so that Bloom can show your completed book. Until then, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Turasaba ko wakwensitara Adobe Reader kugira ngo Bloom ibe yagaragaza igitabo kirangiye. Kugeza igihe uzabikorera, ushobora gukomeza kubika igitabo muri PDF no kugifungurira mu zindi porogaramu.

trans-unit.source: That's strange... Adobe Reader gave an error when trying to show that PDF. You can still try saving the PDF Book.
trans-unit.target: Ntibisanzwe... Adobe Reader yagaragaje ko habaye ikosa mu gihe hageragezwaga kugaragaza iyo PDF. Ushobora gukomeza kugerageza kubika igitabo cya PDF.

trans-unit.source: Sad News. Bloom wasn't able to get Adobe Reader to show here, so Bloom can't show your completed book.\nPlease uninstall your existing version of 'Adobe Reader' and (re)install 'Adobe Reader'.\nUntil you get that fixed, you can still save the PDF Book and open it in some other program.
trans-unit.target: Amakuru ababaje. Bloom ntiyashoboye kubona Adobe Reader yo kwerekana hano, ubwo rero Bloom ntishobora kugaragaza igitabo cyuzuye.\nUbwo rero wakuramo inonosora ufite rya 'Adobe Reader' ukongera kwensitara 'Adobe Reader".\nKugeza igihe biri bukosokere, ushobora gukomeza kubika igitabo muri PDF no kugifungura mu zindi porogaramu.

trans-unit.source: Make a booklet from the inside pages of the book. Pages will be laid out and reordered so that when you fold it, you'll have a booklet.\n
trans-unit.target: Kora agatabo ukoresheje amapaji y'imbere muri iki gitabo. Amapaji araramburwa ku buryo yipanga ku murongo maze igihe uyazinze aze gutanga agatabo.

trans-unit.source: Upload to BloomLibrary.org, where others can download and localize into their own language.
trans-unit.target: Kohereza kuri BloomLibrary.org, aho abandi bashobora gukurura igitabo cyawe bakagihindura mu ndimi kavukire z'iwabo.

trans-unit.note: Instead of making a booklet, just make normal pages

trans-unit.source: Make a PDF of every page of the book, one page per piece of paper.
trans-unit.target: Kora PDF ya buri paji y'igitabo,ipaji imwe ku urupapuro rumwe.

trans-unit.source: Open the PDF in the default system pdf viewer
trans-unit.target: Fungura PDF muri sisitemu ntangarugero isoma pdf

trans-unit.source: All rights reserved (Contact the Copyright holder for any permissions.)
trans-unit.target: Uburenganzira bw'umwanditsi bugomba kubahirizwa (Vugana n'ufite uburenganzira kuri iyi nyandiko ku burenganzira bwose waba wifuza.)

trans-unit.source: BloomLibrary.org already has a previous version of this book from you. If you upload it again, it will be replaced with your current version.
trans-unit.target: BloomLibrary.org yamaze kwakira inonosora rya mbere ry'iki gitabo wanditse. Niba wongeye kucyinjizamo, kirasimburwa n'igishya ushaka gushyiramo.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem downloading your book. You may need to restart Bloom or get technical help.
trans-unit.target: Habaye ikibazo cyo gukurura igitabo cyawe. Urasabwa kongera gutangira Bloom cyangwa gushaka ubufasha bwa tekiniki.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there was a problem uploading {0}. Some details follow. You may need technical help.
trans-unit.target: Tukwiseguyeho, habaye ikibazo cyo kwinjizamo {0}. Amakuru arambuye ni akurikira. Ushobora gukenera ubufasha bwa tekiniki.

trans-unit.source: One or more fields above need your attention before uploading
trans-unit.target: Umwe cyanwa myinshi mu myanya yo hejuru ikeneye ko uyitaho mbere yo kwinjizamo

trans-unit.source: By uploading, you confirm your agreement with the Bloom Library Terms of Use and grant the rights it describes
trans-unit.target: Mu gihe winjijemo, wemeye amabwiriza y'ubwumvikane bw'imikoreshereze ya Bloom Library kandi utanze uburenganzira ayo masezerano avuga.

trans-unit.source: There was a problem uploading your book.
trans-unit.target: Habaye ikibazo mu kwinjizamo igitabo cyawe.

trans-unit.source: We cannot sign you up with that address, because we already have an account with that address. Would you like to log in instead?
trans-unit.target: Ntidushoboye kutuma winjira ukoresheje iyo aderese, kuberako dusanzwe dufite konti iyikoresha. Waba se ahubwo wifuza kwinjira?

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to verify your login. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ntishobora kwihuza na seriveri ngo igenzure ikwinjira kwawe. Twagusabaga ko ugenzura konegisiyo y'urusobe mpuzamasangano rwawe.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to complete your login or signup. This could be a problem with your internet connection, our server, or some equipment in between.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ntiyashoboye kwihuza burundu na seriveri kugira ngo urangize kwinjira cyangwa gusohoka. Ibi bishobora kuba byatewe na konegisiyo yawe ya interineti, seriveri yacu cyangwa ibikoresho bimwe bihuza izo nzira bitameze neza.

trans-unit.source: In order to sign up for a BloomLibrary.org account, you must check the box indicating that you agree to the BloomLibrary Terms of Use.
trans-unit.target: Kugira ngo wiyandikishe kuri konti ya BloomLibrary.org, usabwa gukanda ku kazu kagaragaza ko wemeye amabwiriza y'imikoreshereze ya BloomLibrary.

trans-unit.source: We don't have a user on record with that email. Would you like to sign up?
trans-unit.target: Ntidufite umuntu ukoresha iyi imeyili. Waba wifuza kwiyandikisha?

trans-unit.source: Password and user ID did not match
Please agree to terms of use
Please enter a valid email address. We will send an email to this address so you can reset your password.
trans-unit.target: Turagusaba ko wakwinjizamo aderese ya imeyili nyayo. Turi bukoherereze imeyili kuriyi aderese kugira ngo ushobore guhindura ijambobanga ryawe.

trans-unit.source: Bloom could not connect to the server to reset your password. Please check your network connection.
trans-unit.target: Bloom ntishobora kwihuza na seriveri ngo uhindure ijambo banga ryawe. Twasabaga ko wagenzura konegisiyo yawe ya interineti.

trans-unit.source: We are sending an email to {0} with instructions for how to reset your password
trans-unit.target: Twohereje imeyili kuri {0} n'amabwiriza y'uburyo bwo guhindura ijambobanga ryawe

trans-unit.source: Please log in to BloomLibrary.org (or sign up) before uploading
trans-unit.target: Twagusabaga kubanza kwinjira muri BloomLibrary.org (cyangwa kwiyandikisha) mbereyo kwinjizamo ibitabo

trans-unit.source: Please set this from the edit tab
trans-unit.target: Twasabaga ko wasibanganya ibi mu mwanya w'inonosora
trans-unit.note: This shows next to the license, if the license has not yet been set.

trans-unit.source: Please add texts to the Sample Texts folder.
trans-unit.target: Twagusabaga ko wongera inyandiko mu idosiye y'inyandiko z'icyitegererezo.

trans-unit.source: Click on letters to add them to this stage.
trans-unit.target: Kanda ku nyuguti uzongere kuri iyi ntambwe.

trans-unit.source: E.g. "ai oo sh ng th ing"
trans-unit.target: Urg. "ai oo sh ng th ing"

trans-unit.source: Help exporting and converting files to use as sample texts
trans-unit.target: Gufasha mu kwimuririra ahandi no guhindura amafishiye yo gukoreshwa nk'imyandiko ntangarugero

trans-unit.source: List letters and word-forming characters in alphabetic order.
trans-unit.target: Gutondekanya inyuguti n'inyandiko y'ikomora ry'amagambo mu buryo bw'itonde ry'inyuguti.
Amagambo yose ashoboka kuri buri gitabo mu gihe agaragaye rimwe gusa

trans-unit.source: Open the sample texts folder for this language.
trans-unit.target: Gufungura idosiye y'inyandiko z'icyitegererezo z'uru rurimi
Amagambo yose ashoboka kuri buri paaji
, Urubuga rw'ishakisha ku bijyanye n'ugusoma no kwandika.
Amagambo yose ashoboka muri buri nteruro

trans-unit.source: set up the alphabet for this language.
Things to remember for this level:
trans-unit.target: Ibintu ukwiye kuzirikana kuri uru rwego:

trans-unit.source: Please take a minute to register {0}
trans-unit.target: Turasaba ko wafata umunota umwe ukiyandikisha {0}
trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.

trans-unit.source: I'm stuck, I'll finish this later.

trans-unit.note: Place a {0} where the name of the program goes.
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab

shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab
shows in the topics chooser in the edit tab

This is the dialog used to set up the wall calendar
